short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for search listening on Google

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SearchPatterns uses Google, Youtube Autosuggest and linguistics to uncover popular and often interesting queries around a topic. It is a free search listening tool and an free alternative to AnswerThePublic.
